Name: HalloweenStory
About the game: In the game you control a space alien. You have to very carefully walk alongside dangerous obstacles in order to get to the portal for teleportation to new dangerous adventures. Features Atmospheric graphics Convenient management Dangerous adventures Gathering sweets, everyone loves sweets for the holidays) Dangerous saws Levers and switches
